segments.source_content: # 📦 plugin-pwa

translations.zh-hant: # 📦 plugin-pwa

segments.source_content: Docusaurus Plugin to add PWA support using [Workbox](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/workbox). This plugin generates a [Service Worker](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/primers/service-workers) in production build only, and allows you to create fully PWA-compliant documentation site with offline and installation support.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 插件，使用 [Workbox](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/workbox) 添加 PWA 支援。此插件僅在生產環境建置時生成 [Service Worker](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/primers/service-workers)，讓您能建立具備離線與安裝功能的完整 PWA 相容文件網站。

translations.zh-hant: ## 安裝 {#installation}

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install --save @docusaurus/plugin-pwa
```

segments.source_content: ## Progressive Web App {#progressive-web-app}

translations.zh-hant: ## 漸進式網路應用 {#progressive-web-app}

segments.source_content: Having a service worker installed is not enough to make your application a PWA. You'll need to at least include a [Web App Manifest](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Manifest) and have the correct tags in `<head>` ([Options > pwaHead](#pwahead)).

translations.zh-hant: 僅安裝 service worker 不足以讓您的應用成為 PWA。您至少需要包含 [Web 應用程式清單](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-TW/docs/Web/Manifest)，並在 `<head>` 中加入正確標籤（參見[選項 > pwaHead](#pwahead)）。

segments.source_content: After deployment, you can use [Lighthouse](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/lighthouse) to run an audit on your site.

translations.zh-hant: 部署後，您可使用 [Lighthouse](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/lighthouse) 對網站進行審核。

segments.source_content: For a more exhaustive list of what it takes for your site to be a PWA, refer to the [PWA Checklist](https://developers.google.com/web/progressive-web-apps/checklist)

translations.zh-hant: 更完整的 PWA 要求清單，請參考 [PWA 檢查表](https://developers.google.com/web/progressive-web-apps/checklist)

segments.source_content: ## Offline mode (precaching) {#offline-mode-precaching}

translations.zh-hant: ## 離線模式（預先快取） {#offline-mode-precaching}

segments.source_content: We enable users to browse a Docusaurus site offline, by using service-worker precaching.

translations.zh-hant: 我們透過 service-worker 預先快取機制，讓使用者能離線瀏覽 Docusaurus 網站。

segments.source_content: The [workbox-precaching](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/workbox/modules/workbox-precaching) page explains the idea:

translations.zh-hant: [workbox-precaching](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/workbox/modules/workbox-precaching) 頁面說明核心概念：

segments.source_content:
> One feature of service workers is the ability to save a set of files to the cache when the service worker is installing. This is often referred to as "precaching", since you are caching content ahead of the service worker being used.
>
> The main reason for doing this is that it gives developers control over the cache, meaning they can determine when and how long a file is cached as well as serve it to the browser without going to the network, meaning it can be used to create web apps that work offline.
>
> Workbox takes a lot of the heavy lifting out of precaching by simplifying the API and ensuring assets are downloaded efficiently.

translations.zh-hant:
> service worker 的功能之一是在安裝時將一組檔案保存至快取，此過程常稱為「預先快取」，因為您是在 service worker 啟用前就完成快取。
>
> 主要目的是讓開發者能控制快取機制，決定檔案何時與多久被快取，並能直接提供給瀏覽器而無需連網，藉此建立可離線運作的網路應用程式。
>
> Workbox 透過簡化 API 與確保資源高效下載，大幅降低預先快取的實作難度。

segments.source_content: By default, offline mode is enabled when the site is installed as an app. See the `offlineModeActivationStrategies` option for details.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，當網站以應用程式形式安裝時會啟用離線模式。詳見 `offlineModeActivationStrategies` 選項說明。

segments.source_content: After the site has been precached, the service worker will serve cached responses for later visits. When a new build is deployed along with a new service worker, the new one will begin installing and eventually move to a waiting state. During this waiting state, a reload popup will show and ask the user to reload the page for new content. Until the user either clears the application cache or clicks the `reload` button on the popup, the service worker will continue serving the old content.

translations.zh-hant: 網站完成預先快取後，service worker 會為後續訪問提供快取回應。當新版本部署並伴隨新版 service worker 時，新版本會開始安裝並最終進入等待狀態。在此等待狀態期間，會顯示重新載入彈窗要求使用者更新內容。在使用者清除應用程式快取或點擊彈窗中的 `reload` 按鈕前，service worker 會持續提供舊版內容。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Offline mode / precaching requires downloading all the static assets of the site ahead of time, and can consume unnecessary bandwidth. It may not be a good idea to activate it for all kind of sites.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

離線模式/預先快取需事先下載網站所有靜態資源，可能消耗不必要的頻寬。並非所有類型網站都適合啟用此功能。

:::

segments.source_content: ### `offlineModeActivationStrategies` {#offlinemodeactivationstrategies}

translations.zh-hant: ### `offlineModeActivationStrategies` {#offlinemodeactivationstrategies}

segments.source_content:
- Type: `('appInstalled' | 'mobile' | 'saveData'| 'queryString' | 'always')[]`
- Default: `['appInstalled', 'queryString', 'standalone']`

translations.zh-hant:
- 類型：`('appInstalled' | 'mobile' | 'saveData'| 'queryString' | 'always')[]`
- 預設值：`['appInstalled', 'queryString', 'standalone']`

segments.source_content: Strategies used to turn the offline mode on:

translations.zh-hant: 啟用離線模式的策略：

segments.source_content:
- `appInstalled`: activates for users having installed the site as an app (not 100% reliable)
- `standalone`: activates for users running the app as standalone (often the case once a PWA is installed)
- `queryString`: activates if queryString contains `offlineMode=true` (convenient for PWA debugging)
- `mobile`: activates for mobile users (`width <= 996px`)
- `saveData`: activates for users with `navigator.connection.saveData === true`
- `always`: activates for all users

translations.zh-hant:
- `appInstalled`：對已將網站安裝為應用的使用者啟用（並非 100% 可靠）
- `standalone`：對以獨立應用形式運行的使用者啟用（通常是 PWA 安裝後的情況）
- `queryString`：若查詢字串包含 `offlineMode=true` 則啟用（方便 PWA 除錯）
- `mobile`：對行動裝置使用者啟用（`width <= 996px`）
- `saveData`：對 `navigator.connection.saveData === true` 的使用者啟用
- `always`：對所有使用者啟用

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Use this carefully: some users may not like to be forced to use the offline mode.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

謹慎使用此功能：部分使用者可能不喜歡被強制使用離線模式。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::danger

It is not possible to detect if a page is rendered as a PWA in a reliable manner.

The `appinstalled` event has been [removed from the specification](https://github.com/w3c/manifest/pull/836), and the [`navigator.getInstalledRelatedApps()`](https://web.dev/get-installed-related-apps/) API is only supported in recent Chrome versions and require `related_applications` declared in the manifest.

The [`standalone` strategy](https://petelepage.com/blog/2019/07/is-my-pwa-installed/) is a nice fallback to activate the offline mode (at least when running the installed app).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::danger

無法以可靠的方式檢測頁面是否以 PWA 形式渲染。

`appinstalled` 事件已[從規範中移除](https://github.com/w3c/manifest/pull/836)，且 [`navigator.getInstalledRelatedApps()`](https://web.dev/get-installed-related-apps/) API 僅在最新版 Chrome 中支援，並需在 manifest 中宣告 `related_applications`。

[`standalone` 策略](https://petelepage.com/blog/2019/07/is-my-pwa-installed/)是啟用離線模式的良好備用方案（至少在運行已安裝應用時）。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Customizing reload popup {#customizing-reload-popup}

translations.zh-hant: ## 自訂重新載入彈出視窗 {#customizing-reload-popup}

segments.source_content: The `@theme/PwaReloadPopup` component is rendered when a new service worker is waiting to be installed, and we suggest a reload to the user. You can [swizzle](../../swizzling.mdx) this component and implement your own UI. It will receive an `onReload` callback as props, which should be called when the `reload` button is clicked. This will tell the service worker to install the waiting service worker and reload the page.

translations.zh-hant: 當新的 Service Worker 等待安裝時，系統會渲染 `@theme/PwaReloadPopup` 元件並建議使用者重新載入。您可以[替換](../../swizzling.mdx)此元件並實作自己的 UI 介面。該元件會接收一個 `onReload` 回調函式作為 props，應在使用者點擊「重新載入」按鈕時觸發，此操作將指示 Service Worker 安裝等待中的版本並重新載入頁面。

segments.source_content: The default theme includes an implementation for the reload popup and uses [Infima Alerts](https://infima.dev/docs/components/alert).

translations.zh-hant: 預設主題內建了重新載入彈出視窗的實作，採用 [Infima 警示框](https://infima.dev/docs/components/alert)樣式。

segments.source_content: ![A screen recording of the reload process. An alert box shows in the bottom right of the window, saying "New content available". After clicking the "Refresh" button, the page's main heading changes from "Introduction" to "PWA :))".](/img/pwa_reload.gif)

translations.zh-hant: ![重新載入流程的螢幕錄製畫面。視窗右下角顯示警示框，內容為「有新內容可用」。點擊「重新整理」按鈕後，頁面主標題從「介紹」變更為「PWA :))」。](/img/pwa_reload.gif)

segments.source_content: Your component can render `null`, but this is not recommended: users won't have a way to get up-to-date content.

translations.zh-hant: 您的元件可以渲染 `null`，但不建議這麼做：使用者將無法取得最新內容。
